title: Relaxed Sri Lanka Beachfront Escape with Sweeping Ocean Views, Onsite Restaurant & Spa
description: Inspired by a beach house escape, indulge in a stay at this haven of contemporary luxury on the southwestern coast of Sri Lanka. When you're not taking a refreshing dip in the hotel's shimmering pool overlooking the ocean, savour seasonal produce designed to nourish the body at the onsite restaurant, and then nurture the mind and spirit with a rejuvenating and holistic treatment at The Sanctuary Spa. This is the ultimate laidback luxury beach vacation.
